title: Leadership Practical Skill Enhancement: Flipped Learning-Based Elementary Chinese Native Language Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Students can self-directively acquire at least 15 Chinese characters per week using flipped learning materials
Learners can generate at least 10 contextually appropriate sentences through online/offline collaborative activities
Participants can deliver a fluent 3+ minute presentation at quarterly project showcases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
